description: Try our easy to follow Poached Eggs with Kale & Mushroom recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Eggs on toast,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Quick & easy breakfast,Tree nut free,Egg,Mushroom,Father's Day,Christmas,Vegetarian,Kale,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Poached Eggs with Kale & Mushroom Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 slice rustic light rye bread, toasted
0.5 bunch green curly kale, stems discarded, leaves shredded

recipeInstructions.text: Half-fill a medium saucepan with water and heat over medium-high heat until just simmering. Stir in vinegar.

Crack an egg into a cup, then carefully slide egg into the water. Cook for 3 minutes or until the white has set but yolk is still soft. Using a slotted spoon, transfer to a plate. Repeat with remaining eggs (you can cook several at once to save time).

Meanwhile, heat oil and turmeric in a large frying pan over high heat. Cook garlic and mushrooms, stirring, for 5-7 minutes or until golden and tender. Stir in kale. Cook for 1-2 minutes or until wilted. Add lemon juice and season with salt and pepper.
Top toast with mushroom mixture and poached eggs and serve immediately.
